pcodPcos: Lifestyle: balanced diet (low refined carbs), regular exercise, sleep hygiene.
Track cycles; consult clinician for hormonal evaluation if irregular.
Watch for acne, hair growth, weight gain; manage with medical advice.
menstrualCare: Use clean, breathable pads/menstrual cups; change regularly.
For cramps: gentle heat pad, hydration, light movement.
Seek help for very heavy bleeding, severe pain, or cycles <21 or >35 days consistently.
wellness: Iron-rich foods if prone to anemia.
Mental well-being: stress management, support systems.
Regular check-ups for reproductive health concerns.
